headline: Why Lennox (LII) Stock Is Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of climate control solutions innovator Lennox International (NYSE:LII) fell 3.6% in the afternoon session after multiple analyst firms lowered their price targets on the stock, citing market challenges.
